text.minefy.config.title: Minefy Config
text.minefy.config.hud.playback.name: Playback
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.name: Tokens (DO NOT TOUCH)
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.descri: Touch only if you know what you're doing.
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.access: Needed to authenticate each request with Spotify.
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.refres: Needed to refresh access token when it expires.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.name: OAuth Client (DO NOT TOUCH)
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.descri: Touch only if you know what you're doing.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.id.des: The OAuth 2.0 Client Id from the Spotify for Developers Dashboard.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.redire: The OAuth 2.0 Redirect URI configured in the Spotify for Developers Dashboard.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.port.d: Port where to open the callback HttpServer.
text.minefy.config.spotify.debug.name: Debug
text.minefy.chat.loggedout.head: Looks like you still have to login with Spotify.\nRun
text.minefy.chat.loggedout.end: to authrorize Minefy to your Spotify account.
